casebody.data:
VAN BEUREN et al., Appellants, v. D’AZEVEDO, Respondent. (City Court of New York,

General Term.

October 29, 1900.) Action by Alfred Van Beuren and others against Jacob C. d’Azevedo. From a judgment for defendant, plaintiffs appeal. Affirmed. May-er & Gilbert, for appellants. Forster & Spair, for respondent. HASOALL, J.

We find that no sufficient reason has been presented for disturbing the record below. Order appealed from affirmed,, with costs and disbursements to respondent.

FITZSIMONS, C. J., concurs.
